sentences.en: He told jokes as an icebreaker.
sentences.cn: 他通过讲笑话来缓解紧张气氛.

sentences.en: It is not enough to get your group together site and have a few icebreaker games.
sentences.cn: 仅仅是让你的队员都聚到一起,玩几次打破僵局的游戏是远远不够的.

sentences.en: Its Icebreaker brand is popular withyoung, image - conscious outdoor enthusiasts.
sentences.cn: 尤其是在羊毛内衣的革新技术的运用方面.

sentences.en: The atomic icebreaker reeved the icebergs.
sentences.cn: 原子破冰船穿过冰山之间向前航行.

sentences.en: This sort of Montana icebreaker isn't for everyone.
sentences.cn: 这种蒙大拿的新鲜旅游并不是适合所有人.

trans.tran_cn: 破冰船，<美>使气氛活跃的东西，打破僵局的东西
trans.tran_en: a ship that cuts a passage through floating ice
